title: Magic Marble
description: The magic marble can grant any wish Scott wishes. However, the wish lasts for twelve hours only. What happens next? It is for you to know! Surely, you will feel the story and relate to it. Your imagination will fly and be enriched by the story. You will love the horror, romance, humor, and suspense incorporated in the story. Most importantly, there is a lesson to be learned.
author: Marble Green
